ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think Tuba should create mini-lakes over the terrain which mobs would have to swim across. ... Ah dang. You got me on that,  I forgot to verantize the
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:05 PM 5/30/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Hehe - man I need to learn not to respond to the list before my first cup of
>coffee in the morning...
>
>I like the Spit Valve of Doom - and there will be different values - a
>trumpet gives smallest affect while a tuba the biggest!

I think Tuba should create mini-lakes over the terrain which mobs would
have to swim across.

>BTW - not to get into another debate on mino horns - but the trombone is a
>Brass Inst not a Wind Inst.

Ah dang. You got me on that, I forgot to "verantize" the instrument
categories. :-P


>Also - I think there should be Wind Instrument "Sax of Gorelick" which has a
>negative affect on all wind songs EXCEPT mez songs - in which case the mez
>is never resisted and has an indefinite duration...

Rofl! Kenny G. music inherently has an AOE mez effect, but unfortunately,
that song of ours is string based.

<off topic>Reminds me of the Budget "Rent a Car" commerical about aroma
therapy candles:
http://www.adcritic.com/content/budget-rent-a-car-aroma-therapy-candles.html

--Windleaf



>Slyde
